properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM REVIEWBOARD WHERE STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,S.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,BOARD_TITLE ,USER_ID ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEWBOARD B LEFT JOIN REVIEW_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO=BOARD_WRITER) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) S) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE REVIEWBOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO=? AND STATUS='Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,USER_ID ,CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEWBOARD B LEFT JOIN REVIEW_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO=BOARD_WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS ='Y'
SELECT FILE_NO ,FILE_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REVIEWBOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ? ,BOARD_CONTENT = ? ,CATEGORY_NO = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET FILE_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? ,UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE REVIEWBOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT REPLY_NO ,REPLY_CONTENT ,USER_ID ,CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY_COURSE R JOIN MEMBER M ON (REPLY_WRITER=USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS ='Y' AND REF_BNO = ?
SELECT BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH FROM REVIEWBOARD JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (BOARD_NO=REF_NO)
